summary: Ruby SDK needs to implement application failure logging and metrics behavior according to ApplicationErrorCategory. This requires waiting for core SDK implementation to provide the necessary foundation.
userImpact: Users will have standardized logging and metrics behavior for application failures consistent with the ApplicationErrorCategory specification.
proposedFix: Apply corresponding logging behavior for ApplicationErrorCategory once core SDK provides the foundation.
resolutionDetails: Implementation completed following core SDK foundation work.
keyQuote: Core-based SDKs only need to apply corresponding logging behaviour, core handles metrics.
